author: nflaig
content: If you haven't started looking at it, there was a PR already https://github.com/ethereum/remote-signing-api/pull/15 which is a simple change that adds electra to block signing. However, for aggregate signing we need another type as the current one only signs over `phase0.AggregateAndProof`, I opened a PR to follow up on that https://github.com/ethereum/remote-signing-api/pull/17
